post:
VPSFlame is a hosting provider with focus on high quality and high performance hosting solutions. VPSFlame is a subsidiary of SafeSurf IVS, a registered company and provider of Internet services located in Denmark.

Our servers are located in Denmark, Germany and the US (Dallas).

All of our products come with an automated daily off-site backup. You can customize the time of day when the backup is run for your services.

Our Linux VPS plans use OpenVZ and Windows plans use KVM by default. If you would like to change to a different virtualization type, please contact us and we will set up a custom plan for you. The available virtualization types are OpenVZ and KVM.

No coupons are needed for the above offers. Simply place your order and it will be set up instantly after a payment has been made.

The rest of our VPS plans as well as other services we offer can be found here.

If you have any questions or would like to request a quote for a custom plan, feel free to contact us at support@vpsflame.com.
